official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, relating to the civil penalty for operating a vessel in a negligent manner.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to increase the civil penalty from $1,000 to $5,000 imposed upon persons who operate a vessel in a negligent manner.

titles.title: To amend title 46, United States Code, relating to the civil penalty for operating a vessel in a negligent manner.
